web_snippets: A skilled researcher and inspiring communicator, Dr. David Burkus is the best-selling author of five books about business and leadership.
David Burkus isn't just another name in the realm of leadership and teamwork. His profound understanding and expertise are backed by rigorous research.
David Burkus. Organizational Psychologist and Leadership Expert; World's Top 50 Management Thinker - Thinkers50; Helping leaders build their best team ever.
